scripts.build: cd client/apps/app-1 && npm install && npm run build
scripts.mig:up-all: i=0; while [ $i -le 5 ]; do knex migrate:up; i=$((i+1)); done
scripts.mig:down-all: i=0; while [ $i -le 5 ]; do knex migrate:down; i=$((i+1)); done
scripts.git:merge-dev-into-main: git checkout main && git merge dev && git push origin && git checkout dev
scripts.git:merge-main-into-v1: git checkout v1 && git merge main && git push origin && git checkout dev
scripts.git:merge-v1-into-prod: git checkout prod && git merge v1 && git push origin && git checkout dev
scripts.git:dev-into-v1-danger: npm run git:merge-dev-into-main && npm run git:merge-main-into-v1
